name: Teku
description:
Teku is an island-building game using hexagonal tiles.
You have a deck of tiles to place on specific, randomly-generated locations.

Your goal is to score as many points as possible by positioning the tiles correctly in relation to each other.
Each type of tile scores points in different ways.







During the game, you'll be taken through levels, each with its own rules, scoring objectives and tiles to assemble. Each game is short, lasting just a few minutes, ideal for short play sessions or the hunt for the top score.

When you start, two game modes are immediately available:
  • Classic mode, in which you must place all the tiles in your deck to finish the game.
  • Challenge mode, in which you unlock new tiles as you score points. In this mode, you can place the tiles wherever you like.
